name: Google+ Dark Text + Transparent Image Fix
description:
Code grabbed from http://blog.hendrixweb.net/2012/06/transparent-images-and-google-plus.html , all credit goes to him.

Changes the background colour of images in Google+ lightbox and thumbnail from black to #777, mid-grey, to allow black text on transparent images to be read.
additional_info:
http://blog.hendrixweb.net/2012/06/transparent-images-and-google-plus.html for the code
https://plus.google.com/u/0/101888127260833972803/posts For the creator's G+ page, give him thanks! <3
